name: EsrpRelease
description: Microsoft Internal tool for submitting releases to ESRP Release
author: Microsoft Corporation.

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Connection Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Input Service connection to authenticate to azure key vault for fetching gateway auth & signing cert.

inputs.name: Intent
inputs.label: Intent
inputs.helpMarkDown: Please enter your intent for this release submission, Ex : PackageDistribution (For publishing packages to third party package managers).

inputs.name: ContentType
inputs.label: Content Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select Workflow ReleaseContentType to be used to publish to specific Package Manager.

inputs.name: Owners
inputs.label: Owners
inputs.helpMarkDown: Owners of the Release, It should be in xyz@microsoft.com format and must be a valid user/account on the Microsoft AAD. Refer : https://microsoft.sharepoint.com/teams/prss/esrp/info/ESRP%20Info%20Wiki/Submission%20Request%20Schema.aspx , Want to check if it's valid -> goto -> portal.azure.com -> AAD -> Users/Groups -> Search it

inputs.name: Approvers
inputs.label: Approvers
inputs.helpMarkDown: Release will be auto approved using the provided approver email ids. Owner should be different from approver. It should be in xyz@microsoft.com format and must be a valid user/account on the Microsoft AAD. Refer : https://microsoft.sharepoint.com/teams/prss/esrp/info/ESRP%20Info%20Wiki/Submission%20Request%20Schema.aspx , Want to check if it's valid -> goto -> portal.azure.com -> AAD -> Users/Groups -> Search it

inputs.name: ServiceEndpointUrl
inputs.label: API Endpoint Url
inputs.helpMarkDown: This is an auto populated field, which is used to submit request to ESRP Release Gateway.

inputs.name: MainPublisher
inputs.label: Main Publisher
inputs.helpMarkDown: This is an auto populated field based on the client id <-> main publisher mapping.

inputs.name: DomainTenantId
inputs.label: Domain TenantId
inputs.helpMarkDown: Please select your domain's Tenant Id.

inputs.name: ContentOrigin
inputs.label: Content Origin
inputs.helpMarkDown: Please enter your content origin of the Release (A value is populated by default).

inputs.name: ProductState
inputs.label: Product State
inputs.helpMarkDown: Please enter your product state out of the options (New, Existing, Sustain).

inputs.name: Audience
inputs.label: Audience
inputs.helpMarkDown: This is an auto populated field based on the content Type input field.
